member.name: T:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller
member.summary: A handy library that lets developers choose the fonts required by their applications, then auto-checks and installs them if not available on any client machine.

member.name: T:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.StringTemplates
member.summary: Provides a list of supported string templates that are generated at runtime providing a qualified name based on the template selected.

member.name: F:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.StringTemplates.AppName
member.summary: Represents the default application's name.

member.name: F:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.StringTemplates.AppVersion
member.summary: Represents the default application's version.

member.name: F:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.StringTemplates.Fonts
member.summary: Represents the list of user-fonts added.

member.name: F:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.StringTemplates.FontsCount
member.summary: Represents the number of user-fonts added.

member.name: F:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.StringTemplates.InstallButtonText
member.summary: Represents the text applied to the installation button.

member.name: F:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.StringTemplates.Empty
member.summary: Represents an empty string template.

member.name: F:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.StringTemplates.FontsRequiredExpression
member.summary: Represents a statement auto-generated based on the number of fonts that are to be installed.

member.name: F:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.StringTemplates.FontsExpression
member.summary: Represents a statement auto-generated based on the number of fonts to be viewed within the collapsed- content area of the Installer dialog.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.TestingMode
member.summary: When set to true, the installation process will be run when debugging from Visual Studio for you to have a test preview of how the process will look like whenever fonts require to be installed. This however won't affect the execution process once your application is deployed to all users.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.DialogOptions
member.summary: Provides a list of customization options for the default Installer dialog that will be displayed once the fonts-installation process begins.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.AutoInstall
member.summary: When set to true, the fonts-installation process will begin immediately the hosting or parent Form is launched. Otherwise when set to false, installation can be done manually using the method or one of its variant methods: , , .

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.AutoRestart
member.summary: When set to true, once the fonts-installation process is completed, the application will be restarted for the font changes to take effect at the application-level. Please note that restarting your application is highly recommended since fonts initialization occurs on startup. Otherwise, no changes will take effect.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.Fonts
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of fonts that will be installed on the user's machine once the application is launched.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.ParentForm
member.summary: Gets or sets the parent form.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.CustomInstallerDialog
member.summary: Gets or sets a custom Installer dialog to be used instead of the default dialog. (Ensure you provide a button that returns ; ) can also come in-handy.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.FontsListBullet
member.summary: Gets or sets the bullet character(s) that will be applied to every font item displayed within the list of fonts that will be installed.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.UserCancelled
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the user cancelled the fonts installation dialog or process.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.UnavailableFonts
member.summary: Gets the list of fonts to be installed on a user's machine from the provided.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.InstallTaskCompleted
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the fonts installation process took place and was completed, successfully or unsuccessfully.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.Instance
member.summary: Gets an instance of .

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.ContainerControl
member.summary: Gets or sets the container control within the parent form. In most cases, this refers and results to the parent form.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.Site
member.summary: Overrides the ISite functionality, getting the main or parent container control in the Form. This is overriden to get the component's host or parent form.

member.summary: Sets the library-default settings.

member.summary: Launches VBScript as a process, installing all pre-requisite fonts for the application.

member.summary: [Reserved] Displays an indeterminate progress window as the required fonts are being installed.

member.summary: Determines whether the library is being run from Visual Studio. This works in both the 'Debug' and 'Release' modes of an executing application.

member.name: M:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.GetFontName(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the actual name of the font from the font-file specified.
member.param: The full path to the TrueType font-file.
member.returns: The font-name if found, or if no name is found.

member.name: M:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.GetFontPath(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the full path to any font installed in the system.
member.param: The font name.
If set to true, the current list of fonts installed will be used during the search; else, a forced search for the font specified will be made in the Windows Fonts directory until found.
member.returns: The full path to the specified font; else returns an empty if the font is not available.

member.name: M:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.IsFontInstalled(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if any particular font installed using its font-file. Acts as a short-hand method for the method.
member.param: The path to the font-file.

member.name: M:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.IsFontInstalled(System.String,System.Drawing.FontStyle)
member.summary: Checks if any particular font installed using its font-file.
member.param: The path to the font-file.
The font-style to check for availability.

member.name: M:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.GetUnavailableFontsList
member.summary: Gets the list of unavailable fonts in the system.

member.name: M:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.GetInstalledFonts
member.summary: Gets the list of installed fonts in the system as per the list of added fonts to install.

member.name: M:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.GetUninstalledFonts
member.summary: Gets the list of uninstalled fonts in the system as per the list of added fonts to install.

member.name: M:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.RefreshFontsCollection
member.summary: Refreshes the list of fonts installed in the system.

member.name: M:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.Install
member.summary: Checks and installs all the fonts added in the collection property.
member.returns: if installation was successful or the font was available, else returns .

member.name: M:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.InstallFont(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Checks and installs any TrueType font-file.

Displays a fonts installation dialog when set to .

member.summary: Checks and installs a list of TrueType font-files.

Displays a fonts installation dialog when set to .

member.name: M:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.InstallFonts(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Checks and installs all TrueType fonts within a specified folder.
member.param: Path to the folder containing the fonts.
Displays a fonts installation dialog when set to .

member.name: M:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.ShowRestartDialog(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Displays the Restart dialog window. This dialog blocks and displays for a set period of time before closing to inform users that a restart event is about to occur. Such a scenario is applicable only after the fonts installation process has been completed, both via manual and automatic installation.
member.param: The time (in milliseconds) to wait before the dialog auto-closes.
When set to true, the application will be restarted once the dialog closes.

member.name: M:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.HideParentWindow
member.summary: Hides the window by minimizing it and fully reducing its opacity.

member.name: M:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.ParseString(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a containing the predefined string template options used in the property, and returns the parsed content in the same format.
member.param: The string to parse.

member.name: E:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.InstallingFonts
member.summary: Raised once the fonts installation process begins.

member.name: E:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.InstallationCompleted
member.summary: Raised once the fonts installation process is completed.

member.name: E:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.FontsInstaller.ApplicationRestarting
member.summary: Raised before the application restarts once the fonts installation process is completed. Adding this event will disable the default 'AutoRestart' feature and allow you to manually restart your application if you need to perform other tasks beforehand. Please note that restarting your application is highly recommended in order to effect the font changes at the application level.

member.summary: Creates a new Installer dialog options object.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.Models.InstallerDialogOptions.WindowTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets the Installer dialog's window title. This refers to the title shown within the Title Bar area of the dialog window.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.Models.InstallerDialogOptions.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the Installer dialog's main title. This refers to the title shown within the content area of the dialog window.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.Models.InstallerDialogOptions.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets the Installer dialog's main content.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.Models.InstallerDialogOptions.CollapsedContent
member.summary: Gets or sets the Installer dialog's collapsed content. The collapsed content by default is set to be the list of fonts that will be installed in a user's computer.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.Models.InstallerDialogOptions.UseElevationIcon
member.summary: When set to true, a Windows Elevation icon will be displayed in the 'Install' button in-place of the standard Arrow icon.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.Models.InstallerDialogOptions.ShowCancelButton
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a 'Cancel' button will be displayed in the Installer dialog to allow exiting the fonts-installation process. [Default: ]

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.Models.InstallerDialogOptions.ShowAppIcon
member.summary: When set to true, the current application's icon will be displayed in the Installation dialog. This can visually help assure the user of the dialog's express origin.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.Models.InstallerDialogOptions.CustomIcon
member.summary: Lets you provide a custom icon file to be used as the Installer dialog's icon. (TIP: Pass the string "(default)" without quotes to apply the default Fonts Installer icon.)

member.name: M:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.Models.InstallerDialogOptions.ToString
member.summary: Returns the default as specified in the Properties window.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.FontsInstallerNS.Properties.Resources.Install
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to ' Modified for better readability & UX. ' ************************************* ' This script simply installs the fonts located within ' its current directory; if any/all of the fonts are ' already installed, then they'll be ignored.
' Please Preserve Contents. ' *************************************
Set filesystem_object = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject") SourceFolder = filesystem_object.GetParentFolderName(Wscript.ScriptFullName)
Const FONTS = &H14&
Set shell_object = Creat [rest of string was truncated]";.
